channel.title: Security guard in On A Rail disappearing.
channel.description: For some reason, sometimes when I play through OAR, the security guard hiding behind the box with the shotgun will randomly disappear in the middle of "look like the troops are fixing to throw you a surprise party." Not sure why.

item.title: Security guard in On A Rail disappearing.
item.dc:creator: Kaleidescoop
item.description:
For some reason, sometimes when I play through OAR, the security guard hiding behind the box with the shotgun will randomly disappear in the middle of “look like the troops are fixing to throw you a surprise party.” Not sure why.
